LinkHints_activate.message: Open a link in the current tab

LinkHints_activateModeToCopyLinkText.message: Copy a link text to the clipboard

LinkHints_activateModeToCopyLinkUrl.message: Copy a link URL to the clipboard

LinkHints_activateModeToOpenImage.message: Show image in a new tab

LinkHints_activateModeToOpenInNewForegro.message: Open a link in a new tab and switch to it

LinkHints_activateModeToOpenInNewTab.message: Open a link in a new tab

LinkHints_activateModeToOpenIncognito.message: Open a link in incognito window

LinkHints_activateModeToOpenVomnibar.message: Edit a link text on Vomnibar

LinkHints_activateModeToSearchLinkText.message: Open or search a link text

LinkHints_activateModeToSelect.message: Select text and enter visual mode

LinkHints_activateModeWithQueue.message: Open multiple links in a new tab

LinkHints_click.message: Click selected text, focused element or the nearest clicked

Marks_clearLocal.message: Remove all local marks for this site

Vomnibar_activate.message: Open URL, bookmark, or history entry

Vomnibar_activateBookmarksInNewTab.message: Open a bookmark in a new tab

Vomnibar_activateHistoryInNewTab.message: Open a history in a new tab

Vomnibar_activateInNewTab.message: Open URL, history, … in a new tab

Vomnibar_activateUrlInNewTab.message: Edit the current URL and open in a new tab

addBookmark.message: Add tabs into a bookmark folder

autoCopy.message: Copy selected text or current frame's title or URL

autoOpen.message: Open selected or copied text in a new tab

captureTab.message: Capture visible area of current tab

closeDownloadBar.message: Close the bottom download bar elegantly

closeTabsOnLeft.message: Close all tabs on the left

closeTabsOnRight.message: Close all tabs on the right

copyWindowInfo.message: Copy title/URL info of a current window

duplicateTab.message: Duplicate current tab for N times

enableCSTemp.message: Enable the site's CS in incognito window

firstTab.message: Go to the first N-th tab

focusInput.message: Focus the N-th visible text box on the page and cycle using tab

focusOrLaunch.message: Focus a tab with given URL or open it

goNext.message: Follow the link labeled next or ">"

goPrevious.message: Follow the link labeled previous or "<"

goToRoot.message: Go to root of current URL hierarchy

joinTabs.message: Collect all tabs into current window

lastTab.message: Go to the last N-th tab

moveTabToNewWindow.message: Move N tabs to new window

nextFrame.message: Cycle forward to the next frame on the page

openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab.message: Open the clipboard's URL in the current tab

openCopiedUrlInNewTab.message: Open the clipboard's URL in N new tabs

openUrl_p.message: url:string, urls:string[], reuse=newFg/current/newBg/reuse, incognito, window, position

passNextKey.message: Pass the next keys to the page

performAnotherFind.message: Find the second or even earlier query words

performBackwardsFind.message: Cycle backward to the previous find match

performFind.message: Cycle forward to the next find match

removeRightTab.message: Close N-th tab on the right

runKey.message: Select and run another mapped key sequence

scrollSelect.message: Switch in items of a (closed) selection box

scrollToBottom.message: Scroll to the bottom of the page

scrollToLeft.message: Scroll all the way to the left

scrollToRight.message: Scroll all the way to the right

scrollToTop.message: Scroll to the top of the page

searchAs.message: Search selected or copied text using current search engine

searchInAnother.message: Redo search in another search engine

showTip.message: Show a tip on the HUD

sortTabs.message: Sort all tabs in current window

toggleSwitchTemp.message: Toggle switch only on current page

visitPreviousTab.message: Go to previously-visited tab on current window

zoomIn.message: Make a current tab zoom in

zoomOut.message: Make a current tab zoom out

cmdConfirm.message:
You have asked Vimium C to perform $1 repeats of the command:
    $2

Are you sure you want to continue?

description.message: A keyboard shortcut tool for keyboard-based page navigation and browser tab operations with an advanced omnibar and global shortcuts

noActiveState.message: As configured, here's no active state

dirtyOptions.message:
Such options have been changed at other places:
      * $1
    Continue to save and override these changes?

beforeUnload.message: You have unsaved changes to options.

ignoredNonEN.message: Keyboard layout has been ignored! Please consider disabling the option.

onlyExtVomnibar.message: Extension vomnibar pages can only work before Chromium $1.

fileVomnibar.message: A file vomnibar is limited by browser to only work on file:///* pages.

httpVomnibar.message: An HTTP vomnibar is limited by browser and doesn't work on HTTPS pages.

refusedURLs.message: The URL "$1" is restricted to be opened by a WebExtension from Firefox browser.

nonPlainURL.message: The value "$1" is not a valid plain URL.

changedBeforeSync.message:
Error:
Sorry, but you're enabling the "Sync settings" option
    while some other options are also modified.
Please only perform one action at a time!

warningForSync.message:
Warning:
the current settings will be OVERRIDDEN the next time Vimium C starts!
Please back up your settings using the "Export Settings" button
!!!        RIGHT NOW        !!!

confirmImport.message:
You are loading $1:
      * from $2Vimium C$3
      * for $4
      * exported $5

Are you sure you want to continue?

keepSyncing.message:
Do you want to keep settings synchronized with your current browser account?

Press "Cancel" to stop it.

JSONParseError.message:
Sorry, Vimium C cannot parse the JSON file:
  an unexpected character at line $1, column $2

notVCJSON.message: Sorry, no Vimium C settings data found!

JSONTooLarge.message:
Fatal Error:

Your settings file "$1" seems too large!

As limited by your browser, the max size is only $2 KB.

upgradeMsg.message: Vimium C has been upgraded to v$1.

tipClickToCopy.message: Tip: Click a command name to copy it to the clipboard.

moveAllTabs.message: Nothing happens when moving every tab of this window

hasIncog.message: This tab has been in an incognito window

notRestoreIfIncog.message: Cannot restore a tab in incognito mode!

indexOOR.message: The session index provided is out of range

noDiscardIfOld.message: Vimium C cannot discard tabs before Chromium $1

noMute.message: Vimium C cannot control mute state before Chromium $1

noStyleName.message: No Vomnibar style name has been given

noSelOrCopied.message: No selected nor copied text found

noSessionItem.message: The closed session may be too old

invalidImg.message: The selected image URL is invalid

noTabHistory.message: Cannot open a history of this tab

notRemoveCur.message: The current tab should be kept

openIncog.message: open this URL in incognito mode

openExtSrc.message: visit HTML of an extension's page

noReader.message: No reader view for this page

jsFail.message: Here's not allowed to eval JS scripts
